# Work Breakdown Structure (WBS) for Adaptive Learning System

```
1. Adaptive Learning System Project
│
├── 1.0 Project Management
│   ├── 1.1 Project Planning
│   │   ├── 1.1.1 Define Scope & Objectives
│   │   ├── 1.1.2 Develop Project Schedule
│   │   ├── 1.1.3 Resource Planning
│   │   ├── 1.1.4 Risk Management Planning
│   │   └── 1.1.5 Quality Management Planning
│   ├── 1.2 Stakeholder Management
│   │   ├── 1.2.1 Identify Stakeholders
│   │   ├── 1.2.2 Develop Stakeholder Engagement Plan
│   │   └── 1.2.3 Communication Planning
│   ├── 1.3 Monitoring & Control
│   │   ├── 1.3.1 Progress Tracking & Reporting
│   │   ├── 1.3.2 Risk Monitoring & Mitigation
│   │   └── 1.3.3 Change Control Management
│   └── 1.4 Project Closure
│       ├── 1.4.1 Final Documentation & Sign-off
│       └── 1.4.2 Lessons Learned & Retrospective
│
├── 2.0 Requirements & Analysis
│   ├── 2.1 Requirements Gathering
│   │   ├── 2.1.1 Stakeholder Interviews & Workshops
│   │   ├── 2.1.2 User Stories & Use Cases
│   │   └── 2.1.3 Regulatory & Compliance Requirements (e.g., GDPR)
│   ├── 2.2 Requirements Analysis & Specification
│   │   ├── 2.2.1 Functional Requirements Specification
│   │   ├── 2.2.2 Non-Functional Requirements Specification (Performance, Scalability, Security)
│   │   └── 2.2.3 Requirements Validation & Approval
│   └── 2.3 Documentation
│       └── 2.3.1 Prepare Requirements Documentation (stored in `docs/`)
│
├── 3.0 System Architecture & Design
│   ├── 3.1 Architecture Design
│   │   ├── 3.1.1 Define System Architecture (Backend, DB, API, Frontend)
│   │   ├── 3.1.2 Select Technology Stack Finalization (Python/Node.js, MongoDB, Docker)
│   │   └── 3.1.3 Define Data Flow & Integration Points
│   ├── 3.2 Database Design
│   │   ├── 3.2.1 Data Model Design (Learner Profiles, Performance Tracking, BKT Model)
│   │   ├── 3.2.2 MongoDB Schema Definition
│   │   └── 3.2.3 Indexing & Performance Optimization Planning
│   ├── 3.3 API Design
│   │   ├── 3.3.1 API Endpoints Definition
│   │   ├── 3.3.2 Security & Authentication Design
│   │   └── 3.3.3 API Documentation Planning
│   ├── 3.4 Core Adaptive Algorithm Design
│   │   ├── 3.4.1 Design Bayesian Knowledge Tracing (BKT) Model
│   │   ├── 3.4.2 Adaptive Challenge Selection Logic
│   │   └── 3.4.3 Integration with Learner Profile & Performance Data
│   └── 3.5 Security & Privacy Design
│       ├── 3.5.1 Data Privacy Framework (GDPR Compliance)
│       ├── 3.5.2 Data Security Controls
│       └── 3.5.3 Consent Management Mechanisms
│
├── 4.0 Development
│   ├── 4.1 Backend/API Development
│   │   ├── 4.1.1 Setup Project Structure & Environment
│   │   ├── 4.1.2 Develop Learner Profile Management APIs
│   │   ├── 4.1.3 Develop Performance Tracking APIs
│   │   ├── 4.1.4 Implement BKT Engine & Algorithms
│   │   ├── 4.1.5 Develop Adaptive Content Delivery Logic
│   │   ├── 4.1.6 Develop Security & Authentication Features
│   │   └── 4.1.7 Future API Features (Assessment Data Integration, Secure API Access)
│   ├── 4.2 Database Layer Development
│   │   ├── 4.2.1 Implement MongoDB Schemas & Models
│   │   ├── 4.2.2 Database Access Layer & Queries
│   │   └── 4.2.3 Indexing & Performance Tuning
│   ├── 4.3 Core Adaptive Logic Development
│   │   ├── 4.3.1 BKT Algorithm Implementation (Python/Node.js)
│   │   ├── 4.3.2 Adaptive Challenge Selection Module
│   │   └── 4.3.3 Integration with Backend APIs
│   ├── 4.4 Utility Scripts Development
│   │   ├── 4.4.1 User Import Script (`import_users.js`)
│   │   ├── 4.4.2 BKT Update Script (`bkt_update.py`)
│   │   └── 4.4.3 Other Utility & Maintenance Scripts
│   ├── 4.5 Containerization & DevOps Setup
│   │   ├── 4.5.1 Dockerfile Creation & Configuration
│   │   ├── 4.5.2 Docker Compose / Multi-Container Setup (if applicable)
│   │   └── 4.5.3 CI/CD Pipeline Integration (optional but recommended)
│   └── 4.6 Testing & Debugging
│       ├── 4.6.1 Unit Testing (Backend, Core Logic)
│       ├── 4.6.2 Integration Testing (API & DB)
│       ├── 4.6.3 Performance & Load Testing
│       └── 4.6.4 Security Testing (Vulnerabilities, Data Protection)
│
├── 5.0 Documentation
│   ├──
